actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to temporarily delay application of proposed changes to the Departmental Appeals Board within the Department of Health and Human Services.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of Health and Human Services from taking any administrative action for one year to finalize or otherwise implement provisions contained in the proposed rule published on December 28, 2007, relating to the Department of Appeals Board established in the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS), including provisions allowing the Secretary to review, amend, or reverse Board decisions.

titles.title: A bill to temporarily delay application of proposed changes to the Departmental Appeals Board within the Department of Health and Human Services.
